trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Red Deer
There were no other sightings in Red Deer on or around December 5th 2003
divs: Sighting Details1. In my car at a stop sign facing north. 2. The brightness of it. 3. Verybright star, then mayby aircraft landing lights. 4. I watched it with cuiositybecause of its location and brightness there are no airports in the area. Whenit dissapeared I rubbed my eyes and shook my head. 5. Looked like a VERY brightstar but a bit larger than any I have seen before. It remained stationary forabout 45 seconds from when I first noticed it as I came to a stop in my car. Itwas still quite dark out. The sun had not come up just yet. After 45 seconds orso it was like someone flipped a switch it dissapeared instantly. 6. Itvanished.
